news.title: New Hampshire Set to Issue First Bitcoin-Backed Municipal Bond
news.body: New Hampshire is on the brink of launching a groundbreaking municipal bond backed by Bitcoin. This initiative, approved by the state's Business Finance Authority, could revolutionize municipal financing by integrating digital assets. It's a significant step that might inspire other states to explore similar financial innovations.

news.title: European Central Bank Enhances Global Payments with UPI and Nexus Integration
news.body: The European Central Bank is spearheading a project to link its Target Instant Payment Settlement system with India's UPI and other Asian real-time payment systems. This move aims to streamline global payments, ensuring faster, more secure cross-border transactions. It's a pivotal development for financial institutions eyeing a more interconnected payment environment.

news.title: EMVCo to Set Global Standards for AI-Driven Agentic Payments
news.body: EMVCo is exploring global specifications for agentic payments, where transactions are executed by AI agents. This initiative could lead to more seamless, integrated payment processes, significantly impacting how digital and automated services handle transactions.

news.title: Ecommpay Broadens Merchant Options with Apple Pay QR Integration
news.body: Ecommpay has integrated a feature enabling merchants to accept Apple Pay via QR codes, enhancing payment versatility across devices. This development not only broadens the accessibility of Apple Pay but also caters to a wider range of merchant scenarios, potentially boosting mobile payment adoption.

news.title: SBS Integrates Wero Digital Wallet to Boost Open Banking Platform
news.body: SBS has upgraded its open banking platform by integrating the Wero digital wallet, aligning with the European Payments Initiative. This enhancement is set to streamline digital transactions and improve user experiences, marking a significant step in evolving the open banking ecosystem.
